member.summary: Bus type to which the storage will be connected Default Type is VIRTIO Type can be IDE or VIRTIO (BusType SCSI will be supported in the future)

member.summary: Defines the device number of the virtual storage. If no device number is set, a device number will be automatically assigned

member.summary: CreateLbRequest

member.summary: data center ID wherein the load balancer is to be created

member.name: P:ProfitBricks.POCO.Requests.CreateLbRequest.LoadBalancerName
member.summary: Name of the load balancer to be created

member.name: P:ProfitBricks.POCO.Requests.CreateLbRequest.LoadBalancerAlgorithm
member.summary: load balancer algorithm. ROUND_ROBIN is default and the only supported algorithm at the moment

member.name: P:ProfitBricks.POCO.Requests.CreateLbRequest.Ip
member.summary: A DHCP IP address is being assigned to the load balancer automatically by ProfitBricks. A private IP can be defined by the user. Additional, public IPs can be reserved and assigned to the load balancer manually.

member.name: P:ProfitBricks.POCO.Requests.CreateLbRequest.LanId
member.summary: Identifier of the target LAN ID > 0 If the specified LAN ID does not exist or if LAN ID is not specified, a new LAN with the given ID / with a next available ID starting from 1 will be created respectively

member.name: P:ProfitBricks.POCO.Requests.CreateLbRequest.ServerIds
member.summary: Identifier of all servers, to which the load balancer is going to distribute traffic. Servers can also be registered to load balancer later

member.summary: CreateNicRequest

member.summary: Identifier of the target virtual server. Required field.

member.name: P:ProfitBricks.POCO.Requests.CreateNicRequest.LanId
member.summary: Identifier of the target LAN > 0 that is to be connected to the specified virtual server. If no LAN exists for such ID, a new LAN with the given ID will be created.

member.summary: Names the NIC

member.summary: Block size / amount of IPs to reserve

member.summary: Select region of reserved IP block (NORTH_AMERICA, EUROPE, DEFAULT) If set to DEFAULT or left empty, IPs will be reserved in the customer's default region

member.summary: CreateStorageRequest.

member.name: P:ProfitBricks.POCO.Requests.CreateStorageRequest.DataCenterId
member.summary: Defines the data center wherein the storage is to be created. If left empty, the storage will be created in a new data center

member.name: P:ProfitBricks.POCO.Requests.CreateStorageRequest.StorageName
member.summary: Name of the storage to be created

member.name: P:ProfitBricks.POCO.Requests.CreateStorageRequest.Size
member.summary: Storage size (in GiB). Required Field.

member.name: P:ProfitBricks.POCO.Requests.CreateStorageRequest.MountImageId
member.summary: Specifies the HDD image to be assigned to the storage by its ID

member.name: P:ProfitBricks.POCO.Requests.CreateStorageRequest.ProfitBricksImagePassword
member.summary: Sets the VM image root login password to the specified value. Only supported for generic Profitbricks HDD images. User images are expected to be preconfigured with a password. If no password is supplied, one is automatically created. Please see error codes for password syntax rules. password must be between 8 and 50 characters, only a-z, A-Z, 0-9 without characters i, I, l, o, O, w, W, y, Y, z, Z and 1, 0

member.name: T:ProfitBricks.POCO.Enums.BusType

member.name: T:ProfitBricks.POCO.Requests.CreateServerRequest
member.summary: CreateServerRequest

member.name: P:ProfitBricks.POCO.Requests.CreateServerRequest.DataCenterId
member.summary: Defines the data center wherein the server is to be created. If left empty, the server will be created in a new data center

member.name: P:ProfitBricks.POCO.Requests.CreateServerRequest.Cores
member.summary: Number of cores to be assigned to the specified server. Required field.

member.name: P:ProfitBricks.POCO.Requests.CreateServerRequest.Ram
member.summary: Number of RAM memory (in MiB) to be assigned to the server. The size is specified in multiples of 256 MiB with a minimum of 256 MiB. Required field.

member.name: P:ProfitBricks.POCO.Requests.CreateServerRequest.ServerName
member.summary: Name of the server to be created

member.name: P:ProfitBricks.POCO.Requests.CreateServerRequest.BootFromStorageId
member.summary: Defines an existing storage device ID to be set as boot device of the server. The storage will be connected to the server implicitly. If not left empty, the bus type to which the storage will be connected is VIRTIO. For a different bus type a subsequent invocation of connectStorageToServer operation is required, with busType as a parameter.

member.name: P:ProfitBricks.POCO.Requests.CreateServerRequest.BootFromImageId
member.summary: Defines an existing CD-ROM/DVD image ID to be set as boot device of the server. A virtual CD-ROM/DVD drive with the mounted image will be connected to the server.

member.name: P:ProfitBricks.POCO.Requests.CreateServerRequest.InternetAccess
member.summary: Set to TRUE to connect the server to the Internet via the specified LAN ID. If the LAN is not specified, it is going to be created in the next available LAN ID, starting with LAN ID 1

member.name: P:ProfitBricks.POCO.Requests.CreateServerRequest.LanId
member.summary: Connects the server to the specified LAN ID > 0. If the respective LAN does not exist, it is going to be created

member.name: P:ProfitBricks.POCO.Requests.CreateServerRequest.OsType
member.summary: Sets the OS type of the server. (WINDOWS, LINUX, OTHER, UNKNOWN) If left empty, the server will inherit the OS Type of its selected boot image / storage

member.name: P:ProfitBricks.POCO.Requests.CreateServerRequest.AvailabilityZone
member.summary: Selects the zone in which the server is going to be created (AUTO, ZONE_1, ZONE_2). Servers from different zones are located in different physical locations. If set to AUTO or left empty, servers will be created in a random zone

member.name: T:ProfitBricks.POCO.Enums.AvailabilityZone
member.summary: Selects the zone in which the server is going to be created (AUTO, ZONE_1, ZONE_2). Servers from different zones are located in different physical locations. If set to AUTO or left empty, servers will be created in a random zone

member.summary: Protocol enum used to define FireWall Rules

member.name: T:ProfitBricks.POCO.Requests.FirewallRuleRequest
member.summary: Firewall Rule

member.name: P:ProfitBricks.POCO.Requests.FirewallRuleRequest.IcmpCode
member.summary: Defines the allowed code (from 0 to 254) if protocol ICMP is chosen. Leave empty to allow all types

member.name: P:ProfitBricks.POCO.Requests.FirewallRuleRequest.IcmpType
member.summary: Defines the allowed type (from 0 to 254) if protocol ICMP is chosen. Leave empty to allow all types

member.name: P:ProfitBricks.POCO.Requests.FirewallRuleRequest.Name
member.summary: Name

member.name: P:ProfitBricks.POCO.Requests.FirewallRuleRequest.PortRangeEnd
member.summary: Defines the end range of the allowed port (from 1 to 65534) if protocol TCP or UDP is chosen. Leave portRangeStart and portRangeEnd empty to allow all ports

member.name: P:ProfitBricks.POCO.Requests.FirewallRuleRequest.PortRangeStart
member.summary: Defines the start range of the allowed port (from 1 to 65534) if protocol TCP or UDP is chosen. Leave portRangeStart and portRangeEnd empty to allow all ports

member.name: P:ProfitBricks.POCO.Requests.FirewallRuleRequest.Protocol
member.summary: Select allowed protocol (TCP, UPD, ICMP, ANY). Default is ANY

member.name: P:ProfitBricks.POCO.Requests.FirewallRuleRequest.SourceIp
member.summary: Only traffic originated from the respective IPv4 address is allowed. Leave empty to allow all source IPs

member.name: P:ProfitBricks.POCO.Requests.FirewallRuleRequest.SourceMac
member.summary: SourceMac

member.name: P:ProfitBricks.POCO.Requests.FirewallRuleRequest.TargetIp
member.summary: In case the target NIC has multiple IP addresses, only traffic directed to the respective IP address of the NIC is allowed. Left empty to allow all target IPs

member.name: P:ProfitBricks.POCO.Server.ConnectedVolumes
member.summary: Lists all storages connected to the server, including the following paramenters: - storageId: storage identifier - storageName: name of the storage - size: storage size (in GiB) For these three parameter see also Create Storage or Get Storage - busType: Bus type to which the storage is connected - deviceNumber: device number the storage is connected For these two parameter see also Connect Storage - bootDevice: a flag, indicating whether server is booting from this storage or not [TRUE/FALSE]

member.name: P:ProfitBricks.POCO.Server.RomDrives
member.summary: Lists all CD-ROM drives assigned to the server, including the parameters of the CD-ROM/DVDs image, such as: - imageId: CD-ROM/DVD image identifier - imageName: name of the CD-ROM/DVD image - bootDevice: a flag, indicating whether server is booting from this drive or not [TRUE/FALSE]

member.summary: Lists all NICs assigned to the server.

member.summary: Renames the target virtual server

member.summary: Updates the amount of cores of the target virtual server

member.summary: Updates the RAM memory (in MiB) of the target virtual server. The minimum RAM size is 256 MiB

member.name: P:ProfitBricks.POCO.Requests.UpdateServerRequest.BootFromStorageId
member.summary: Defines an existing CD-ROM/DVD (ISO) image ID to be set as boot device of the server. A virtual CD-ROM/DVD drive with the mounted image will be connected to the server implicitly.

member.name: P:ProfitBricks.POCO.Requests.UpdateServerRequest.BootFromImageId
member.summary: Defines an existing storage device ID to be set as boot device of the server. The storage will be connected to the server implicitly.

member.summary: Updates OS Type of the target server (WINDOWS, LINUX, OTHER, UNKOWN)

member.name: P:ProfitBricks.POCO.Requests.UpdateServerRequest.AvailabilityZone
member.summary: Zone in which the server is located (AUTO, ZONE_1, ZONE_2)
